name: DailyGurbani
0:
”Alexa, open daily gurbani”
”Alexa, ask daily gurbani for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start daily gurbani”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guru granth sahib
des: This skill helps the people who want to listen Guru Granth Sahib ji on a daily basis. Guru Granth Sahib ji containing 1430 Ang (Pages). If a Sikh regular reading Gurbani it could complete within 72 hours. So we are distributing this Gurbani into a 30 minute audio. The listener can easily listen and enjoy the Gurbani.Completion of Gurbani takes 150 days around. We will put daily next Ang (Pages) audio. Now the question is why people like to hear it. Because this is very hard to save 150 audio collection in mobile or Bluetooth player, etc. Because it is hard to remember which Ang(page) Gurbani we were listening. Using alexa app our team keep the record of everyday so daily listeners can enjoy Gurbani without any repetition.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
